examples.example: 我们的企业通过不断创新和优质服务，逐步扩大了在市场中的市场份额。

translate.english: Our enterprise has gradually expanded its market share in the market through continuous innovation and high-quality services.

examples.example: 这家公司凭借其优秀的产品和营销策略，成功增加了自己的市场份额。

translate.english: This company successfully increased its market share by virtue of its excellent products and marketing strategies.

examples.example: 我们公司一直努力提升产品质量和服务水平，持续增加着在市场中的市场份额。

translate.english: Our company has been constantly striving to improve the quality of products and the level of service, continuously increasing its market share in the market.
